text: AD Ports Group (formerly Abu Dhabi Ports Company and ADPC) is a ports, industrial zones and logistics operator company based in Abu Dhabi, the capital of the United Arab Emirates. == History == Abu Dhabi port was established in March 2006 as part of the restructuring of the commercial ports sector in the emirate, Abu Dhabi Ports. It controlled and regulated power over all commercial ports assets of the Abu Dhabi Seaports Authority (ADSA).Abu Dhabi Ports acquires MICCO to expand logistics solutions | Seatrade Maritime == Digital == Abu Dhabi Sport was formed in 2016. Its digital arm Maqta Gateway supports Abu Dhabi Ports in its numerous digital channels and the widespread digital mandate of Abu Dhabiâ€™s maritime and others. == References == Category:Transport companies Category:Companies of the United Arab Emirates Category:2006 establishments in Asia Category:Abu Dhabi (emirate)
title: AD Ports Group
